transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello? Haan, yes, speaking from IndiaMART.
Customer: Hmm, okay. Sir, aapke paas woh baat hua tha sir regarding aap ek ticket bhi raise kiye the na, a, Kipson naam se. A, kya problem hai sir woh?
Customer: Sir, aap kiske baare mein bol rahe ho?
Executive: Kiske baare mein?
Customer: A, aap abhi ticket raise kar rahe the na, 9696 call karke.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Haanji, uske baare mein tha.
Executive: Kaunsi employee ka naam kya tha?
Executive: Nahi sir, aapke paas ek aadmi IndiaMART se baat kiya tha, woh, woh employee ka naam Kipson hai.
Customer: Kipson ke baare mein main thodi bola hai.
Executive: Nahi sir, aapke paas 17th of, 17th of November mein baat hua tha yaar, regarding a, iske baare mein.
Customer: Main Kipson nahi hai, Kipson mere se achcha se baat karta hoon. Woh aapka jo Balakrishnan karke hai, koi hai kya?
Executive: Balakrishnan, Balakrishnan nahi hai sir. Kyunki kya hua, employee kya baat kare?
Customer: Jabardasti.
Executive: Hmm. Sorry? Jabardasti se baat karta hai. Kya time se baat karta hoon. Theek hai, main toh abhi gaadi chala raha hoon. Hmm. Theek hai, aap nahi toh mujhe kal subah ke liye phone kar lo, nahi toh aap ek ghante ke baad phone karna. Tabhi main office pahunch jaega. Haan, nahi toh kal.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai. Kabhi main office pahunchega? 5:30 baje.
Customer: Haan, 5:30 baje. Chal, main toh kal subah kar sakte hai kya?
Executive: Yeh kal bhi, sabar bhi baat karta hoon sir, koi problem nahi. Bas itna hi hai, aur kuch nahi, Balakrishnan aisa kuch hai uska naam? A, unse kuch problem ho gaya tha.
Executive: Theek hai, kya baat kare sir woh, halki kuch baat kare the aapke paas?
Customer: Yahi jabardasti baat karta hai, kyun renewal karane ke liye tha. Woh bol raha hai kyun payment nahi bhej rahe, aise, aise, aise.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Woh dhang se nahi baat kar rahe the?
Customer: Woh bol raha hai abhi mera jo renewal ka time abhi time hai na abhi. Haanji, haanji. Haan, phir kyun jabardasti kar raha hoon? Woh bol raha hai aisa nahi hai, main aapko abhi discount de dunga, woh de dunga, yeh de dunga.
Executive: Haan. Theek hai, main ek kaam karta hoon sir, iske upar aisa nahi call aayega because abhi Kipson se aapko toh achche se baat ho raha hai na. Kipson ke baad mein aapko koi bhi nahi call karega, Kipson aapko take care karega. Theek hai? In case kuch.
Customer: Kipson se toh mujhe koi lapda nahi hai, woh koi achcha, woh achcha banda hai, theek hai koi. Mera jo problem kya tha, maine kya bola tha, mere ko a, jo kya bolta hai apna a, service manager. Haan? Ji, ji. A, South mein nahi chahiye.
Executive: Nahi chahiye? Theek hai, okay, okay. Bas wohi concern tha.
Executive: Theek hai sir. A, abhi yeh change hone ke liye main koshish karta hoon sir, yeh change hone ke liye main a, management mein baat karta hoon. Abhi a, Kipson actually yeh kya hua hai, November 17th of November Kipson aapke paas baat kiya tha. Theek hai? Toh a, uske, uske baare mein feedback aapko WhatsApp shuru, WhatsApp regarding a, the interaction between employee versus a, client, a, customer. Toh employee kya karegi, a, not satisfied with the interaction with Kipson karke degi. Woh yeh concern se raise hua hai naam a, Kipson ke naam mein. Toh uske wajah se bhi call kiya tha regarding. Ji, ji, ji. Theek hai, main ek kaam karta hoon sir, main abhi woh Kipson ka naam mein woh complaint hai na, woh close kar doon? With your permission?
Customer: Yes, yes.
Executive: Theek hai. Aisa nahi hai, aap dusra koi tha.
Executive: Ji sir, main woh dekhta hoon sir, woh koi baat kare, main check karta hoon. Check karke a, iske upar a, aise client, I mean employee koi bhi aapko nahi call karenge. In case call kar rahega toh tumne mujhe yeh number mein same time mein call karo, main aapko support kar deta hoon. Theek hai? Abhi main woh concern close karta hoon, aapko mail mein woh uske regarding mein aapko ek feedback milega sir. Just feedback matti dekhna sir. If in case woh ke mera interaction aayega toh aap satisfied de sakte ho. Theek hai na?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Ji sir, thank you, thank you so much. Thank you, thank you, thank you. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Received forceful calls for renewal.

- Does not want service manager in South.



Resolution:

- Assured no further calls except from Kipson.

- Agreed to close complaint in Kipson's name.

- Will try to change service manager location.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will receive feedback mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- renewal, service manager, forceful calls, feedback
